title: The Cape Town Affair (1967 Thriller) Target for every spy... cop... and killer in Cape Town!

sources.title: The Cape Town Affair (1967 Thriller) Target for every spy... cop... and killer in Cape Town!
sources.description:
Skip McCoy, a sly pickpocket, swipes Candyâ€™s purse, unknowingly snagging top-secret microfilm, and soon finds himself dodging spies, cops, secret agents, and Communists in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse across Cape Town. As alliances shift and danger mounts, Skip and Candy must outwit their pursuers before the Cold War heats up.

Original title: The Cape Town Affair

Director: Robert D. Webb
Writers: Harold Medford, Samuel Fuller, Dwight Taylor 

Main cast:
James Brolin - Skip McCoy
Jacqueline Bisset - Candy
Claire Trevor - Sam Williams
Bob Courtney - Capt. Herrick, Security Branch

Genres: Espionage, Crime, Mystery, Thriller, Drama
Release date: September 19, 1967
Filming location: Cape Town, South Africa
